Wisdom: النُّفُوسُ طَلِقَةٌ لَكِنَّ أَيْدِيَ الْعُقُولِ تُمْسِكُ [تَمْلِكُ‏] أَعِنَّتَهَا عَنِ النُّحُوسِ
enWisdom: Souls are free but the hands of the intellects hold their reins and protect them from [wretchedness and] misfortune

Wisdom: اجْعَلْ مِنْ نَفْسِكَ عَلَى نَفْسِكَ رَقِيباً وَاجْعَلْ لِآخِرَتِكَ مِنْ دُنْيَاكَ نَصِيباً
enWisdom: Make yourself a guardian over your soul and reserve a portion of this world for your Hereafter

Wisdom: أَقْوَى النَّاسِ أَعْظَمُهُمْ سُلْطَاناً عَلَى نَفْسِهِ
enWisdom: The strongest of people is one who has the greatest command over his soul

Wisdom: دَوَاءُ النَّفْسِ الصَّوْمُ عَنِ الْهَوَى وَالْحِمْيَةُ عَنْ لَذَّاتِ الدُّنْيَا
enWisdom: The cure of the soul is abstaining from vain desires and abstinence from the pleasures of this world

Wisdom: ذَلِّلْ نَفْسَكَ بِالطَّاعَةِ وَحَلِّهَا بِالْقَنَاعَةِ وَخَفِّضْ فِي الطَّلَبِ وَأَجْمِلْ فِي الْمُكْتَسَبِ
enWisdom: Humble your soul through obedience and adorn it with contentment; reduce your wants and be moderate in your earning

Wisdom: رَحِمَ اللَّهُ امْرَأً أَلْجَمَ نَفْسَهُ عَنْ مَعَاصِي اللَّهِ بِلِجَامِهَا وَقَادَهَا إِلَى طَاعَةِ اللَّهِ بِزِمَامِهَا
enWisdom: May Allah have mercy on the person who holds back the reins of his soul from acts of disobedience to Allah and steers it towards the obedience of Allah by its reins
Whoever protects his soul [from evil] is revered
Your soul requires from you that which you have familiarized it with
Whoever is controlled by his [carnal] soul, his status is lowered

Wisdom: مَنْ شَغَلَ نَفْسَهُ بِمَا لَا يَجِبُ [وَ مَا يُحِبُ‏] ضَيَّعَ مِنْ أَمْرِهِ مَا يَجِبُ [وَ مَا يُحِبُ‏]
enWisdom: Whoever preoccupies himself with that which is not necessary, lets the matters that are obligatory slip by

Wisdom: مَنْ كَانَ لَهُ مِنْ نَفْسِهِ يَقَظَةٌ كَانَ عَلَيْهِ مِنَ اللَّهِ حَفَظَةٌ
enWisdom: One whose soul is vigilant and careful has protectors from Allah watching over him

Wisdom: مَنْ سَامَحَ نَفْسَهُ فِيمَا يُحِبُّ [يَجِبُ‏] أَتْعَبَهُ فِيمَا يَكْرَهُ
enWisdom: One who is lenient with his soul in that which he loves is troubled by it in that which he hates

Wisdom: مَنْ دَاهَنَ نَفْسَهُ هَجَمَتْ بِهِ عَلَى الْمَعَاصِي الْمُحَرَّمَةِ
enWisdom: Whoever deals leniently with [and flatters] his soul, it makes him rush towards forbidden sins

Wisdom: نَظَرُ النَّفْسِ لِلنَّفْسِ الْعِنَايَةُ بِصَلَاحِ النَّفْسِ
enWisdom: Introspection turns one’s attention to self-reformation

Wisdom: لَا تُرَخِّصْ [لَا تُرَخِّصَنَ‏] لِنَفْسِكَ فِي شَيْ‏ءٍ مِنْ سَيِّئِ الْأَقْوَالِ وَالْأَفْعَالِ
enWisdom: Do not permit yourself to engage in any evil speech or action

Wisdom: لَا تُرَخِّصُوا لِأَنْفُسِكُمْ أَنْ تَذْهَبَ بِكُمْ فِي مَذَاهِبِ الظَّلَمَةِ
enWisdom: Do not permit your selves to take you into the paths of the oppressors

Wisdom: لَا تَجْعَلَنَّ لِلشَّيْطَانِ فِي عَمَلِكَ نَصِيباً وَلَا عَلَى نَفْسِكَ سَبِيلًا
enWisdom: Never allot a portion for Satan in your actions and do not give him access to your soul

Wisdom: يَنْبَغِي أَنْ يَكُونَ الرَّجُلُ مُهَيْمِناً عَلَى نَفْسِهِ مُرَاقِباً قَلْبَهُ حَافِظاً لِسَانَهُ
enWisdom: It behoves a man to guard his soul, watch over his heart and protect his tongue

Wisdom: الثِّقَةُ بِالنَّفْسِ مِنْ أَوْثَقِ فُرَصِ الشَّيْطَانِ
enWisdom: Overconfidence [in oneself] is one of the strongest opportunities for Satan
